name: Twisty Knife: Hit the Woody
description:
Throw the knives into the logs to break them.. Each 5th stage is defended by a boss - beat them to get exclusive knives!

Game Features:
- Beautiful Wooden style scene
- Dozens of knives with wooden design and more to come
- Simple control
- Easy and fun to play, even more fun to master with skills
- Unique game mechanics

Twisty Knife is ultimate knife hit challenge with thrilling fun and actions! Flip the knife will improve your skills and reaction just using your mobile phone. Unlock new knife from the chest and hit with new knife every time.
